mapper.insert: insert into tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log (activity_id, reward_id, user_id, add_time, seconds, status, send_time, logistics_number, logistics_name, reward_name, consignee, province, city, district, twon, address, mobile, from_user_id ) values (#{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reward_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seconds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{send_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logistics_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logistics_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reward_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{from_user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log set activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reward_id = #{reward_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seconds = #{seconds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, send_time = #{send_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logistics_number = #{logistics_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_name = #{logistics_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reward_name = #{reward_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, twon = #{twon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_user_id = #{from_user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, activity_id, reward_id, user_id, add_time, seconds, status, send_time, logistics_number, logistics_name, reward_name, consignee, province, city, district, twon, address, mobile, from_user_id from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, activity_id, reward_id, user_id, add_time, seconds, status, send_time, logistics_number, logistics_name, reward_name, consignee, province, city, district, twon, address, mobile, from_user_id from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log
SELECT count(id) from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where from_user_id = #{user_id} and user_id = #{shareId} and YEARWEEK(date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
select count(id) from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where user_id = #{user_id} and activity_id = #{activity_id} and YEARWEEK(date_format(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
select count(id) from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where user_id = #{user_id} and from_user_id = 0 and TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( add_time) <= 1
select count(id) from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where activity_id = #{activity_id} and status = 1 and add_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 MINUTE) order by add_time asc

select count(id) from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where activity_id = #{activity_id} and status = 1 and user_id = #{user_id} and add_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) order by add_time asc

select id, activity_id, reward_id, user_id, add_time, seconds, status, send_time, logistics_number, logistics_name, reward_name, consignee, province, city, district, twon, address, mobile, from_user_id from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where status = 1

select id, activity_id, reward_id, user_id, add_time, seconds, status, send_time, logistics_number, logistics_name, reward_name, consignee, province, city, district, twon, address, mobile, from_user_id from tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log where reward_id = #{reward_id} and user_id = #{user_id}

update tp_ten_seconds_activity_reward_log set province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, twon = #{twon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{Mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
